get.description:
List analyses for an application.
Resources do not include relations.

Each report collates dependencies by name and SHA.

- name
- version
- sha
- indirect
- labels
- application.id
- application.name
- businessService.id
- businessService.name
- tag.id

- provider
- name
- labels

- name

Each report collates insights by ruleset/rule.

post.description:
Create an analysis.
Form fields:
file: A manifest file that contains 3 sections
containing documents delimited by markers.
The manifest must contain ALL markers even when sections are empty.
Note: `^]` = `\x1D` = GS (group separator).
Section markers:
^]BEGIN-MAIN^]
^]END-MAIN^]
^]BEGIN-INSIGHTS^]
^]END-INSIGHTS^]
^]BEGIN-DEPS^]
^]END-DEPS^]
The encoding must be:
- application/json
- application/x-yaml

get.description:
Get a bucket by ID.
Returns api.Bucket when Accept=application/json.
Else returns index.html when Accept=text/html.
Else returns tarball.

get.summary: Get bucket content by ID and path.
get.description:
Get bucket content by ID and path.
When path is FILE, returns file content.
When path is DIRECTORY and Accept=text/html returns index.html.
?filter=glob supports directory content filtering.
Else returns a tarball.
